info.name: sideForge API
info.description:
Side3D API enables the management of customizable 3D scenes and assets for end users and administrators.

Main features:
- **Users & Roles:** Handles admin and customer roles, user authentication and verification.
- **Assets:** Manage base 3D assets (e.g., t-shirt, mug) with customizable parts and configuration.
- **Designs:** Customize assets through textures, materials, colors, logos, and text overlays.
- **Scenes:** Configure 3D scenes with camera, lighting, and associated customized designs.
- **Ownership & Access:** Link scenes to their owning users, and enforce access controls on customization.

The API is structured around resource-oriented endpoints supporting the complete lifecycle of 3D asset customization and scene management.

Contact Support:
 Name: sideForge by krub-dev

request.description: Returns the details of a user by their ID.
Updates the data of an existing user.
Deletes a user by their ID.
Returns a paginated list of users filtered by role.

response.name: OK

request.description: Returns a paginated list of users.

response.name: OK
